title: Spicy Eggs 'n' Oats Scramble
directions: In a bowl, whisk together the egg and egg whites until frothy.
Add the oats, basil, and pepper. Allow to soak for 3 minutes.
Coat a skillet with cooking spray, then wipe away the excess spray with a paper towel. Heat the skillet over medium heat. Add the egg mixture and cook for 30 seconds.
Add the tomatoes, spinach, and onion. Cook, stirring, for 3 to 4 minutes, or until the eggs are firm.
Remove to a plate and top with the cheese and hot-pepper sauce.
ingredients: 1/3 cup chopped fresh baby spinach (about 10 leaves)
